com.rohanclan.cfml.dictionary
Class Tag

java.lang.Object
  com.rohanclan.cfml.dictionary.Procedure
      com.rohanclan.cfml.dictionary.Tag
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable
public class Tag
extends Procedure

This class represents a syntax dictionary tag (should probably be renamed to DictionaryTag or something similar). Like Function it inherits from Procedure as a Tag is really a Procedure - it takes parameters and returns no value. Bear that in mind :)

A tag has a number of states with regards to it's HTML/XML compatibility. For example:

  • Single: The tag is something like a <cfbreak>
  • xmlstyle: The tag is XML compatible like a <cfbreak/>
  • hybrid: ????

Author:
Rob

Constructor Detail

Tag

public Tag(java.lang.String name,
           boolean single)
Constructs a new Tag with the specified name and whether or not it is a single tag or not (i.e. <cfbreak>).

Parameters:
name - The name of the tag
single - Is the tag a single tag or not

Tag

public Tag(java.lang.String name,
           boolean single,
           boolean style,
           byte creator)
Creates a tag with a series of tag-based info. The name, whether or not the tag is single or not, the style (is it xmlstyle or not) and it's creator (see syntax dictionaries for more info).

Parameters:
name - The name of the tag
single - Is the tag a single tag or not?
style - Is the tag XML style or not?
creator - The creator/author of the tag

Tag

public Tag(java.lang.String name,
           boolean single,
           boolean style,
           byte creator,
           boolean hybrid,
           boolean anyAttribute)
Creates a tag with a series of tag-based info. The name, whether or not the tag is single or not, the style (is it xmlstyle or not) and it's creator (see syntax dictionaries for more info). Additionally it takes whether or not the tag is a hybrid (???) and whether it can take any attribute (ala <cfif>).

Parameters:
name - The name of the tag
single - Is the tag a single tag or not?
style - Is the tag XML style or not?
creator - The creator/author of the tag
hybrid - Is the tag a hybrid or not
anyAttribute - Can the tag take any attribute
